name: hoast-player
description: 360 degree video player with dynamic binaural higher-order ambisonics rendering, depending on view direction and zoom factor.

scripts.build-wasm: em++ --bind -O1 -s WASM=1 -s BINARYEN_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 GainProcessor.cpp -o gain-processor.wasmmodule.js
